name: Paws and Leaves: A Thracian Tale
storyline: This is the story of a young fox’s premature death. While discovering a forest, you will learn how to interact with the world step by step and start to see it in new playful ways, while you help Me to remember his senses. You will need the help of time and seasons to find pieces of your memory that lead your way through this very touching journey.
summary: While discovering seasons of a forest, memories will recover the senses of Me, a fox, to fulfill his destiny in a touching story beyond life.
